product_name: The North Face Texture Cap Rock Fleece Jacket - Men's
long_description: Versatile and packable, the Texture Cap Rock fleece jacket from The North Face insulates as a breathable midlayer during active pursuits in winter and works as an outer layer when it warms a bit. Polartec(R) midweight fleece is non-pilling, breathable, soft and continues to insulate even if wet; natural stretch provides extra comfort. Includes zippered hand pockets and a zippered chest pocket. Zip-in integration feature lets you zip jacket into compatible shells and parkas from The North Face.
short_description: Versatile and packable, the Texture Cap Rock fleece jacket from The North Face insulates as a breathable midlayer during active pursuits in winter and works as an outer layer when it warms a bit.
